title: Heron Mill
description: Mother says I'm strange.After hiding me away in a school for twelve years, her new husband wants me home. To be a family.Out in the middle of nowhere, the Blackwell family's stone mansion stands tall. Heron Mill is hidden, tucked away deep in the forest, surrounded by nothing but trees. Something nefarious hides here. A sinister secret decaying in its basement.And then there's him.My new stepbrother is unusual.The things he does, different. His behaviour, curious. The way his dark eyes watch me from the shadows when he thinks I don't notice, unnatural.Wrong.I can feel the darkness inside of him, cold and vicious. A sickness, something contagious, a poison seeping into my bones, disturbing something that long lied dormant. Something inside of me is starting to awaken and I'm really not sure it's something good.*Heron Mill is a standalone, dark, MF, stepbrother, forbidden, horror, love story. The relationship in this book is dark and twisted, everything that happens is balancing on a knifes edge. This is not light or fluffy. It's dark and gritty. Please, if you do not enjoy being pushed too far, do not pick up this book.**Please read with caution, the characters in this book do not and will not conform to society's standards or normalities. This book does have a happy ever after.*Content Warning - primal kink, blood play, knife play, spit play, fear, violence, murder, corpses, grief, heavy mental health topics, drugs, domestic abuse, child neglect.
author: K.L. Taylor-Lane
